Text: RE HPLGulf Coast IT Agreement Cc to me Im going to be out of the office tomorrow but Tom Cones asked me to have you send him an execution draft of the agreement for his signature John R Bonica John R Bonica PC Marquart Suite Houston Texas Telephone This email message may contain confidential information belonging to the sender that is proprietary privileged confidential or otherwise exempt from disclosure This message is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of this message Original Message From mailto Sent April PM To Cc Subject HPLGulf Coast IT Agreement Mr Bonica Mr Cones Please find the attached Interruptible Gas Transportation Agreement for your review and comment The document incorporates the changes to the assignment and arbitration provisions discussed yesterday If you have any questions please give me or Mike a call Cordially See attached file Gulf Coastredline doc Eric Gillaspie Enron Building
